job_desc: Developed and maintained high-quality video streaming web applications and CMS systems, including styleing UI interface and implement payment integration and authrization for website.
Focused on performance optimization and user experience for client website, and ensured the product could be perfectly presented and interacted on various browsers and devices.
Collaborated with product team members to develop the single page web application interface of PaaS services, which utilized Docker and Kubernetes, and other container technologies.
Enhanced user experience and accomplish webpage objectives by creating site structure, navigation, page optimization, and improved web functionality and responsiveness.
Researched, designed, and prototyped a more approachable and valuable experience for users  as a core part of the Fortune City App team.
Increased customer retention rates by ravamping begineers instruction and conducted A/B testing and user interviews with team to gain insight into the needs and behaviors of users.
